-haq ya Eqvaina#maqnvapa#Syaqt tEnaiqvainaq(gm)q saMBa#ratiq tvAma#gnEq puShka#rAqdadhItyA#ha 
puShkarapaqrNE hyE#naqmupa#Sritaq-mavi#ndaqt tamu# tvA daqddhya~g~gRuShiqrityA#ha daqddhya~gvA A#tharvaqNa-stE#jaqsvyA#sIqt tEja# EqvAsmi#n dadhAtiq tamu# tvA pAqthyO vRuShEtyA#haq 
pUrva#mEqvOdiqta-mutta#rENAqBi gRu#NAti - [  ] 19
